com.emiliano.fmframework.core

Class Configuration<SoftElement>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.emiliano.fmframework.core.Configuration<SoftElement>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable

    public class Configuration<SoftElement>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable
    The class Configuration represents an assignment of features states in a feature model. The feature state can be SELECTED, DESELECTED and UNSELECTED

      • isPartialConfiguration

        public boolean isPartialConfiguration()
        Checks if it is a partial configuration, i.e. if it contains at least one unselected feature.
        Returns:
